name: Bee Cookie
description: A cute bee-shaped cookie with a creamy vanilla filling.
longDescription: Our Bee Cream Filled Cookie is crafted with a buttery cookie shell and filled with rich, smooth vanilla cream. Perfect for kids' parties and themed celebrations.
instructions: Store in an airtight container. Best consumed within 3 days.
expertTips: Serve chilled for a refreshing taste.
shippingDetails: Delivered in a secure, temperature-safe package.

name: Rainbow Pudding Cup
description: A vibrant, colorful pudding perfect for kids' parties.
longDescription: This Rainbow Pudding Cup brings fun to every bite with layers of colorful, creamy pudding topped with sprinkles and candy. A favorite among kids for birthdays and celebrations.
expertTips: Add whipped cream on top for extra fun.
shippingDetails: Packed and shipped cold for freshness.

name: Fun Donut Assortment
description: A box of colorful donuts with fun toppings.
longDescription: Our Fun Donut Assortment includes donuts decorated with colorful icing, sprinkles, and candy, perfect for kids' events and celebrations.
instructions: Best enjoyed fresh. Store at room temperature for up to 24 hours.
expertTips: Pair with warm milk or hot cocoa for a treat.
shippingDetails: Carefully packaged to prevent damage during shipping.

name: Colorful Popsicle Treats
description: Frozen popsicles with bright, fun colors.
longDescription: These frozen popsicles are made with fresh fruit juices and vibrant natural colors, making them a refreshing and fun snack for kids.
instructions: Keep frozen until ready to serve.
expertTips: Perfect for summer parties and hot days.

name: Mini Party Muffins
description: Small muffins in assorted fun flavors.
longDescription: These mini muffins come in a variety of flavors, including chocolate, vanilla, and berry. A great addition to any kids' birthday party.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Best consumed within 2 days.
expertTips: Serve warm for an extra soft texture.

name: Birthday Fun Popsicle
description: A small, colorful birthday cake designed for kids.
longDescription: Our Birthday Fun Cake is a colorful, themed cake with sprinkles, candy, and fun designs, perfect for children's celebrations.
instructions: Store in a cool place. Best served at room temperature.
expertTips: Add candles and decorations to make it special.
shippingDetails: Packaged in a sturdy cake box for safe delivery.

name: Minion Popsicle
description: Frozen popsicle shaped like a minion.
longDescription: This fun popsicle is shaped like a minion and made with fruity flavors. A fun treat for kids who love cartoons and colorful desserts.
shippingDetails: Delivered in chilled packaging to maintain shape and freshness.

name: Candyland Bites
description: Sweet, colorful candy bites for kids.
longDescription: These bite-sized treats are packed with candy goodness, making them perfect for parties, gifts, or a fun snack time.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place.
expertTips: Mix with popcorn for a fun movie-night snack.
shippingDetails: Delivered in a sealed bag for freshness.

name: Snail Cream Puffs
description: Cute snail-shaped cream puffs with sweet filling.
longDescription: Our Snail Cream Puffs are filled with vanilla cream and designed in a fun snail shape to delight kids and adults alike.
instructions: Store in a refrigerator. Best served chilled.
expertTips: Dust with powdered sugar before serving.
shippingDetails: Packed carefully to maintain shape and freshness.

name: Spider Eye Cookies
description: Spooky cookies with candy eyes, perfect for kids.
longDescription: Spider Eye Cookies are fun, spooky-themed cookies topped with candy eyes, making them a hit at Halloween or themed parties.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place.
expertTips: Use them as party favors for themed events.

name: Tentacle stick
description: Spooky cupcakes decorated with candy tentacles.
longDescription: Tentacle Cupcakes are fun, monster-themed cupcakes decorated with candy tentacles, perfect for Halloween or kids' parties.
instructions: Store in a cool place. Best consumed within 2 days.
expertTips: Serve with colorful drinks for a complete themed party treat.
